+       &lt;!-- Introduction --&gt;
+       &lt;section class="hero" aria-labelledby="intro-heading"&gt;
+         &lt;h2 id="intro-heading" class="visually-hidden"&gt;Introduction&lt;/h2&gt;
+         &lt;p class="hero-tagline"&gt;Frequently Asked Questions&lt;/p&gt;
+         &lt;p class="hero-subtitle"&gt;
+           Common questions about Mark It Down.
+         &lt;/p&gt;
+       &lt;/section&gt;
+ 
+       &lt;!-- FAQ Content --&gt;
+       &lt;section aria-labelledby="faq-heading"&gt;
+         &lt;h2 id="faq-heading" class="visually-hidden"&gt;FAQ&lt;/h2&gt;
+ 
+         &lt;div class="philosophy-list"&gt;
+           &lt;div class="philosophy-item"&gt;
+             &lt;h3&gt;Q: Will my data be deleted if I clear Chrome's cache?&lt;/h3&gt;
+             &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;A: No, your data will not be deleted.&lt;/strong&gt; Notes are stored in Chrome extension storage (&lt;code&gt;chrome.storage.local&lt;/code&gt;), which is separate from browser cache.&lt;/p&gt;
+             &lt;ul style="margin-top: var(--spacing-sm); padding-left: var(--spacing-lg);"&gt;
+               &lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Browser cache cleared&lt;/strong&gt; â†’ Data is preserved âœ…&lt;/li&gt;
+               &lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Extension uninstalled&lt;/strong&gt; â†’ Data is deleted âš ï¸&lt;/li&gt;
+             &lt;/ul&gt;
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+ 
+           &lt;div class="philosophy-item"&gt;
+             &lt;h3&gt;Q: Will the app slow down if I have too many notes?&lt;/h3&gt;
+             &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;A: Mark It Down is designed as a "workspace," not a storage system.&lt;/strong&gt; It's not intended for storing large amounts of data.&lt;/p&gt;
+             &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Recommended usage:&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
+             &lt;ul style="margin-top: var(--spacing-sm); padding-left: var(--spacing-lg);"&gt;
+               &lt;li&gt;Keep around 20 active notes&lt;/li&gt;
+               &lt;li&gt;Export completed notes: &lt;strong&gt;Archive â†’ Export â†’ Delete&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
+               &lt;li&gt;Check storage usage in the sidebar (warning at 80%+)&lt;/li&gt;
+               &lt;li&gt;Use Git sync for external backup&lt;/li&gt;
+             &lt;/ul&gt;
+             &lt;p style="margin-top: var(--spacing-sm);"&gt;&lt;em&gt;ğŸ’¡ Workspace cleanup: Mark It Down is a temporary workspace. Regularly "graduate" your notes to keep it running smoothly.&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+ 
+           &lt;div class="philosophy-item"&gt;
+             &lt;h3&gt;Q: Why is the app so fast to start?&lt;/h3&gt;
+             &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;A: Lazy loading and code splitting reduce initial load by 86%.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
+             &lt;p&gt;Mark It Down optimizes startup speed with the following strategies:&lt;/p&gt;
+             &lt;ul style="margin-top: var(--spacing-sm); padding-left: var(--spacing-lg);"&gt;
+               &lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Mermaid lazy loading&lt;/strong&gt; - The 2.3MB library doesn't load at all for notes without Mermaid diagrams&lt;/li&gt;
+               &lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Code splitting&lt;/strong&gt; - Split into 7 chunks for parallel loading and caching&lt;/li&gt;
+               &lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Chrome extension storage&lt;/strong&gt; - No file system access needed, instant data retrieval&lt;/li&gt;
+             &lt;/ul&gt;
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+ 
+           &lt;div class="philosophy-item"&gt;
+             &lt;h3&gt;Q: Will the editor slow down with large files (100KB+)?&lt;/h3&gt;
+             &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;A: Optimizations ensure smooth editing even for large documents.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
+             &lt;p&gt;Mark It Down implements the following optimizations for large documents (100KB+, 150+ code blocks):&lt;/p&gt;
+             &lt;ul style="margin-top: var(--spacing-sm); padding-left: var(--spacing-lg);"&gt;
+               &lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;CodeMirror disabled&lt;/strong&gt; - Automatically disabled for 100KB+ files (57% faster loading: 7s â†’ 3s)&lt;/li&gt;
+               &lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Loading skeleton&lt;/strong&gt; - Spinner + skeleton UI during initial load for 100KB+ documents&lt;/li&gt;
+               &lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;CSS content-visibility&lt;/strong&gt; - Skips rendering content outside the viewport&lt;/li&gt;
+               &lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;CSS containment&lt;/strong&gt; - Limits reflow/repaint range to the editor&lt;/li&gt;
+               &lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Decoration optimization&lt;/strong&gt; - Recalculates only changed ranges (incremental updates)&lt;/li&gt;
+               &lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Auto spellcheck disabled&lt;/strong&gt; - Reduces CPU load for 100KB+ documents&lt;/li&gt;
+             &lt;/ul&gt;
+             &lt;p style="margin-top: var(--spacing-sm);"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Note:&lt;/strong&gt; For 100KB+ documents, code block syntax highlighting and LaTeX equations are disabled. This is an intentional trade-off prioritizing loading speed.&lt;/p&gt;
+             &lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;ğŸ’¡ Design philosophy: Mark It Down is a "place to digest." It's not for storing large raw data, but for organizing and editing before "graduating" your notes.&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+ 
+           &lt;div class="philosophy-item"&gt;
+             &lt;h3&gt;Q: What does storage capacity depend on?&lt;/h3&gt;
+             &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;A: Primarily depends on available disk space.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
+             &lt;table style="width: 100%; margin-top: var(--spacing-sm); border-collapse: collapse;"&gt;
+               &lt;thead&gt;
+                 &lt;tr style="border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-primary);"&gt;
+                   &lt;th style="text-align: left; padding: var(--spacing-xs) var(--spacing-sm);"&gt;Usage Pattern&lt;/th&gt;
+                   &lt;th style="text-align: left; padding: var(--spacing-xs) var(--spacing-sm);"&gt;Disk Usage&lt;/th&gt;
+                   &lt;th style="text-align: left; padding: var(--spacing-xs) var(--spacing-sm);"&gt;RAM Usage&lt;/th&gt;
+                   &lt;th style="text-align: left; padding: var(--spacing-xs) var(--spacing-sm);"&gt;Startup Speed&lt;/th&gt;
+                 &lt;/tr&gt;
+               &lt;/thead&gt;
+               &lt;tbody&gt;
+                 &lt;tr style="border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-subtle);"&gt;
+                   &lt;td style="padding: var(--spacing-xs) var(--spacing-sm);"&gt;Normal use (20-50 notes)&lt;/td&gt;
+                   &lt;td style="padding: var(--spacing-xs) var(--spacing-sm);"&gt;Several MB&lt;/td&gt;
+                   &lt;td style="padding: var(--spacing-xs) var(--spacing-sm);"&gt;Several MB&lt;/td&gt;
+                   &lt;td style="padding: var(--spacing-xs) var(--spacing-sm);"&gt;Instant&lt;/td&gt;
+                 &lt;/tr&gt;
+                 &lt;tr&gt;
+                   &lt;td style="padding: var(--spacing-xs) var(--spacing-sm);"&gt;Unintended use (1,000+ notes)&lt;/td&gt;
+                   &lt;td style="padding: var(--spacing-xs) var(--spacing-sm);"&gt;-&lt;/td&gt;
+                   &lt;td style="padding: var(--spacing-xs) var(--spacing-sm);"&gt;-&lt;/td&gt;
+                   &lt;td style="padding: var(--spacing-xs) var(--spacing-sm);"&gt;May slow down â†’ Archive/Export recommended&lt;/td&gt;
+                 &lt;/tr&gt;
+               &lt;/tbody&gt;
+             &lt;/table&gt;
+             &lt;p style="margin-top: var(--spacing-sm);"&gt;&lt;em&gt;ğŸ’¡ To use comfortably: Instead of storing many notes, maintain a cycle of "digest â†’ organize â†’ graduate."&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+       &lt;/section&gt;
+

+       &lt;!-- Storage Repair --&gt;
+       &lt;section aria-labelledby="storage-repair-heading"&gt;
+         &lt;h2 id="storage-repair-heading"&gt;Storage Repair&lt;/h2&gt;
+         &lt;p&gt;If duplicate notes or data inconsistencies occur, you can repair storage from the settings.&lt;/p&gt;
+ 
+         &lt;div class="philosophy-list"&gt;
+           &lt;div class="philosophy-item"&gt;
+             &lt;h3&gt;How to Repair Storage&lt;/h3&gt;
+             &lt;ol style="margin-top: var(--spacing-sm); padding-left: var(--spacing-lg);"&gt;
+               &lt;li&gt;Open &lt;strong&gt;âš™ Settings&lt;/strong&gt; â†’ &lt;strong&gt;Troubleshooting&lt;/strong&gt; tab â†’ &lt;strong&gt;Repair Storage&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
+               &lt;li&gt;Click the &lt;strong&gt;"Scan"&lt;/strong&gt; button&lt;/li&gt;
+               &lt;li&gt;If issues are found, select notes to delete and repair&lt;/li&gt;
+             &lt;/ol&gt;
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+ 
+           &lt;div class="philosophy-item"&gt;
+             &lt;h3&gt;What Gets Detected&lt;/h3&gt;
+             &lt;table style="width: 100%; margin-top: var(--spacing-sm); border-collapse: collapse;"&gt;
+               &lt;thead&gt;
+                 &lt;tr style="border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-primary);"&gt;
+                   &lt;th style="text-align: left; padding: var(--spacing-xs) var(--spacing-sm);"&gt;Item&lt;/th&gt;
+                   &lt;th style="text-align: left; padding: var(--spacing-xs) var(--spacing-sm);"&gt;Description&lt;/th&gt;
+                 &lt;/tr&gt;
+               &lt;/thead&gt;
+               &lt;tbody&gt;
+                 &lt;tr style="border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-subtle);"&gt;
+                   &lt;td style="padding: var(--spacing-xs) var(--spacing-sm);"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Duplicate notes&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
+                   &lt;td style="padding: var(--spacing-xs) var(--spacing-sm);"&gt;Notes with the same title exist in multiple folders&lt;/td&gt;
+                 &lt;/tr&gt;
+               &lt;/tbody&gt;
+             &lt;/table&gt;
+             &lt;p style="margin-top: var(--spacing-sm);"&gt;&lt;em&gt;ğŸ’¡ Rarely, ghost notes (notes that exist in storage but don't appear in the UI) may be created if Git sync is interrupted. This feature can detect and delete them.&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+       &lt;/section&gt;
+ 
+       &lt;!-- Storage Analysis --&gt;
+       &lt;section aria-labelledby="storage-analysis-heading"&gt;
+         &lt;h2 id="storage-analysis-heading"&gt;Storage Analysis&lt;/h2&gt;
+         &lt;p&gt;Check storage usage and organize old notes in bulk.&lt;/p&gt;
+ 
+         &lt;div class="philosophy-list"&gt;
+           &lt;div class="philosophy-item"&gt;
+             &lt;h3&gt;How to Analyze Storage&lt;/h3&gt;
+             &lt;ol style="margin-top: var(--spacing-sm); padding-left: var(--spacing-lg);"&gt;
+               &lt;li&gt;Open &lt;strong&gt;âš™ Settings&lt;/strong&gt; â†’ &lt;strong&gt;Troubleshooting&lt;/strong&gt; tab â†’ &lt;strong&gt;Storage Analysis&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
+               &lt;li&gt;Click the &lt;strong&gt;"Analyze"&lt;/strong&gt; button&lt;/li&gt;
+             &lt;/ol&gt;
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+ 
+           &lt;div class="philosophy-item"&gt;
+             &lt;h3&gt;What's Displayed&lt;/h3&gt;
+             &lt;ul style="margin-top: var(--spacing-sm); padding-left: var(--spacing-lg);"&gt;
+               &lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Notes by folder&lt;/strong&gt; - Number of notes and percentage per folder&lt;/li&gt;
+               &lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Top 10 largest notes&lt;/strong&gt; - With checkboxes for bulk archive&lt;/li&gt;
+               &lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Stale notes&lt;/strong&gt; - Notes not updated for 90+ days&lt;/li&gt;
+             &lt;/ul&gt;
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+ 
+           &lt;div class="philosophy-item"&gt;
+             &lt;h3&gt;Bulk Archive&lt;/h3&gt;
+             &lt;p&gt;Select notes and move them to Archive folder in bulk with pinning. Useful for regular backups and storage cleanup.&lt;/p&gt;
+             &lt;p style="margin-top: var(--spacing-sm);"&gt;&lt;em&gt;ğŸ’¡ System Notes are excluded from analysis (auto-generated guide files).&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+       &lt;/section&gt;
+ 
+       &lt;!-- Duplicate Note Detection --&gt;
+       &lt;section aria-labelledby="duplicate-notes-heading"&gt;
+         &lt;h2 id="duplicate-notes-heading"&gt;Duplicate Note Detection&lt;/h2&gt;
+         &lt;p&gt;If notes with the same title are detected, a warning banner is displayed with a side-by-side comparison to choose which one to keep.&lt;/p&gt;
+ 
+         &lt;div class="philosophy-list"&gt;
+           &lt;div class="philosophy-item"&gt;
+             &lt;h3&gt;What Happens&lt;/h3&gt;
+             &lt;ul style="margin-top: var(--spacing-sm); padding-left: var(--spacing-lg);"&gt;
+               &lt;li&gt;A warning banner appears when duplicate notes are detected&lt;/li&gt;
+               &lt;li&gt;Click to open a side-by-side comparison modal&lt;/li&gt;
+               &lt;li&gt;Choose which note to keep&lt;/li&gt;
+             &lt;/ul&gt;
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+       &lt;/section&gt;
+ 
+       &lt;!-- Important: Before Uninstalling --&gt;
+       &lt;section aria-labelledby="uninstall-warning-heading"&gt;
+         &lt;h2 id="uninstall-warning-heading"&gt;âš ï¸ Important: Before Uninstalling&lt;/h2&gt;
+         &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Uninstalling the extension will delete all saved notes.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
+         &lt;p&gt;Mark It Down data is stored in &lt;code&gt;chrome.storage.local&lt;/code&gt;, and uninstalling the extension will delete the data.&lt;/p&gt;
+         &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Before uninstalling, be sure to back up using one of the following methods:&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
+         &lt;ol style="margin-top: var(--spacing-sm); padding-left: var(--spacing-lg);"&gt;
+           &lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Export all notes as ZIP&lt;/strong&gt;: Settings (âš™) â†’ "Export all notes as ZIP"&lt;/li&gt;
+           &lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Push to GitHub&lt;/strong&gt;: Git â–¼ â†’ Sync (or Git Settings â†’ Push)&lt;/li&gt;
+         &lt;/ol&gt;
+         &lt;p style="margin-top: var(--spacing-sm);"&gt;&lt;em&gt;ğŸ’¡ We recommend regular exports to avoid losing important notes.&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
+       &lt;/section&gt;
+ 
+       &lt;!-- CTA Section --&gt;
+       &lt;section class="cta-section" aria-labelledby="cta-heading"&gt;
